name: Rotate Match!
description:
RotateMatch! is a new puzzle game that trains your brain! Swipe to rotate the puzzle until you see a complete shape Dive into a whole new 3D puzzle experience!
The most addictive game with the simplest control ever.
Relax and enjoy the masterpieces you will create!

How to control: Drag to the direction you want to rotate the piece.

We love you! Enjoy!
